sense.name: 事情: matter, thing, business, affair
sense.examples:
这些年，他干了许多可耻的事情。
He has done many dishonorable things these years
新闻界把事情夸大了。
The affair was dramatized by the press.
这件事情你应该请教你的律师。
You should seek advice from your lawyer on this matter.
如果没有别的事情, 我们的会议可以结束了.
Unless there is any other business, we can end the meeting.

sense.name: 事情, 事故: accident
sense.examples:
我在家出了点事情, 打碎些陶器.
I had a slight accident at home and broke some crockery.
不用急，这是小事情。
Don't worry, it was an accident.

sense.name: 职业, 事情 : occupation, job, work
sense.examples:
骑马是她最喜欢的事情。
Riding is her favorite occupation.
筹集资金是你的事情。
Raising money is your job.
园子里有许多事情要做.
There is plenty of work to be done in the garden.
